name: Ridecell
headline: Fleet Transformation Cloud-Automate to Maximize ð usage &â¦
description:
Ridecell is leading the way in the digital transformation of fleet businesses and operations. Our Fleet Automation and Mobility solutions modernize and monetize fleets by combining data insights with digital vehicle control to turn todayâs manual processes into automated workflows. The result is unmatched levels of efficiency and control for leasing, rental,  government, commercial and shared fleets.

Today Ridecell powers some of the most successful fleet businesses and the leading government fleets in cities across Europe and North America. Our customers and partners include:
Penske  - the largest truck fleet in America with 400,000 trucks
Mobility fleets for Toyota, Ford, Daimler, BMW - - the largest OEMs in the world and
BNP Paribas, Arval: 1,500,000 vehicles, the 2nd largest fleet in Europe
And  the largest government fleets in the world including San Francisco, New York City, the Belgian Government 

Our platform makes these businesses more intelligent, accessible, efficient and safer by connecting and automating the core technology pillars including vehicle technology like telematics, camera and ADAS system, and enterprise platforms including CRM, commerce and finance systems. 

Ridecell is headquartered in San Francisco, California with offices in Madrid, Paris, Berlin and Pune, India.
tags: industry:saas; industry:iot; industry:b2b; industry:enterprise; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Aarjav Trivedi, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Aarjav founded Ridecell in 2009 and has led its growth from a demand-response service on a university campus to the leading business operations platform for mobility operators. Prior to Ridecell, Aarjav worked in engineering at SpiDynamics (acquired by HP) and as a research engineer at CipherTrust and Secure Computing (acquired by McAfee). Aarjav holds an MS in Computer Science from Georgia Institute of Technology and a BS in Computer Science from the University of Mumbai.

## This website uses cookies
With your consent, we use cookies to personalise content and ads, provide social media features and analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media and advertising and analytics partners that may combine it with other information that you have provided to them or that they have collected from your use of their services.

We do not use cookies of this type.
  * Statistics  2

**_ga_#** Used by Google Analytics to collect data on the number of times a user has visited the website as well as dates for the first and most recent visit.

  * Marketing  35

![](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/mobile-banner_3.jpg)
[![cloud icon](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/Ridecell360_logo.svg)](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/ridecell-360/>)
# AI that matters for fleet and leasing.
**[Ridecell 360](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/ridecell-360/> "Ridecell 360")** helps leasing companies and automotive OEMs with visibility and efficiency previously unseen in the industry – using AI that was purpose-built for fleets. 
## Real-time intelligence to orchestrate your leasing operations.
Harness AI with Ridecell 360 for intelligent and actionable insights. Automate activities throughout the entire vehicle lifecycle for efficiency and differentiated client experiences.
[Learn more](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/ridecell-360/>)
![](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/2_UncoverBlindSpots.svg)
## Predict operational issues
Increase vehicle lifetime revenue and eliminate costs with AI-generated insights for supplier management, vehicle visibility and keep/sell decisions.
![](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/3_Orchestrate-Improvements.svg)
## Prioritize recommended actions
Reduce idle days, increase staff productivity and customer satisfaction with prioritized actions and automated workflows.
![](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/1_Blueprinting.svg)
## Automate solution onboarding
AI-based process mapping, contract ingestion and data interpretation for an automated onboarding experience. 
AI you can use. Today.
**Put AI to work to onboard data, continuously surface insights, and uncover blind spots across your entire fleet business.**
Efficiently digitize your business with AI-driven onboarding. Ridecell 360 incorporates advanced AI to analyse your contracts and systems to automatically create a custom process map—for a specific department or across the vehicle lifecycle. Ridecell 360 learns vendor SLAs from your agreements, deciphers proprietary data formats, and transforms unstructured data into structured insights—all while keeping your data private and secure. It’s systems integration that self-integrates.
With real-time data, Ridecell 360 can identify anomalies and potential issues before they escalate. And with natural language commands, employees will be able to easily create and automate workflows simply by asking.
Welcome to the future of fleet.
[Learn more](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/solutions/ridecell-intelligence/>)
![Surface insights across your business](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/img-Ridecell_Fleet_Visibility.png)
![Unlock powerful automations](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/img-operations360_detail.png)
![Fleet Management Automation Icon](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/icon_pin_FleetIoT.png)
## Streamline updates with intelligent automation.
AI with Ridecell 360 doesn’t just onboard—it proactively keeps your operations current. Using AI-generated conversations, you can automate calling vendors, recording responses, and even simulate employees exporting reports directly from web interfaces—no API required. This ensures that every status is always up to date, no matter the system. Why does this timeliness matter? Ridecell 360 enables you to take insights gained and quickly turn them into actions and workflows, making your fleet business even more nimble and efficient.
[Learn more](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/solutions/ridecell-orchestration/>)
Powerful data intelligence and workflow orchestration for automotive fleets.
[![img-Ridecell 360 - Order to Delivery](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/icon_pin_ridecell360-order-to-delivery.png)](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/solutions/order-to-delivery/>)
Order to Delivery
Increase visibility and remove bottlenecks throughout your order to delivery process. [Learn more.](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/solutions/order-to-delivery/>)
[![Ridecell 360 Supplier Intelligence](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/icon_pin_supplierintelligence_sml_142.png)](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/solutions/supplier-intelligence/>)
Supplier Intelligence
AI-powered supplier performance management for FMCs. [Learn more.](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/solutions/supplier-intelligence/>)
[![Ridecell 360 Defleet to Remarketing](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/icon_pin_ridecell360_remarketing_142.png)](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/solutions/defleet-to-remarketing/>)
Defleet to Remarketing
Maximize value as end of contract approaches. [Learn more.](https://www.ridecell.com/<https:/ridecell.com/solutions/defleet-to-remarketing/>)

About Ridecell
Ridecell, Inc. is a leading provider of fleet orchestration solutions for fleet and leasing management. The Ridecell 360 fleet industry cloud provides data-driven intelligence and automation solutions to modernize and optimize fleet businesses. Ridecell 360 uncovers blind spots and orchestrates improvements throughout the business and vehicle lifecycle to enable a superior customer experience.
Today, Ridecell powers some of the most successful fleet businesses in cities across Europe and North America, including Arval, Merchants Fleet and KINTO by Toyota Sweden. Ridecell is headquartered in San Francisco, California, with offices in Tokyo, Paris, Berlin, and Pune, India.

# AI that matters for fleet and leasing.
**Ridecell 360⟨7⟩** helps leasing companies and automotive OEMs with visibility and efficiency previously unseen in the industry – using AI that was purpose-built for fleets. 
## Real-time intelligence to orchestrate your leasing operations.
Harness AI with Ridecell 360 for intelligent and actionable insights. Automate activities throughout the entire vehicle lifecycle for efficiency and differentiated client experiences.
Learn more⟨7⟩
![](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/2_UncoverBlindSpots.svg)
## Predict operational issues
Increase vehicle lifetime revenue and eliminate costs with AI-generated insights for supplier management, vehicle visibility and keep/sell decisions.
![](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/3_Orchestrate-Improvements.svg)
## Prioritize recommended actions
Reduce idle days, increase staff productivity and customer satisfaction with prioritized actions and automated workflows.
![](https://ridecell.com/wp-content/uploads/1_Blueprinting.svg)
## Automate solution onboarding
AI-based process mapping, contract ingestion and data interpretation for an automated onboarding experience. 
AI you can use. Today.
**Put AI to work to onboard data, continuously surface insights, and uncover blind spots across your entire fleet business.**
Efficiently digitize your business with AI-driven onboarding. Ridecell 360 incorporates advanced AI to analyse your contracts and systems to automatically create a custom process map—for a specific department or across the vehicle lifecycle. Ridecell 360 learns vendor SLAs from your agreements, deciphers proprietary data formats, and transforms unstructured data into structured insights—all while keeping your data private and secure. It’s systems integration that self-integrates.
With real-time data, Ridecell 360 can identify anomalies and potential issues before they escalate. And with natural language commands, employees will be able to easily create and automate workflows simply by asking.
Welcome to the future of fleet.
Learn more⟨8⟩
![Surface insights across your business⟨37⟩]
![Unlock powerful automations⟨38⟩]
![Fleet Management Automation Icon⟨39⟩]
## Streamline updates with intelligent automation.
AI with Ridecell 360 doesn’t just onboard—it proactively keeps your operations current. Using AI-generated conversations, you can automate calling vendors, recording responses, and even simulate employees exporting reports directly from web interfaces—no API required. This ensures that every status is always up to date, no matter the system. Why does this timeliness matter? Ridecell 360 enables you to take insights gained and quickly turn them into actions and workflows, making your fleet business even more nimble and efficient.
Learn more⟨9⟩
Powerful data intelligence and workflow orchestration for automotive fleets.

Ridecell 360 uncovers blind spots and orchestrates improvements throughout the business and vehicle lifecycle to enable a superior customer experience.

generated_description:
### Ridecell Overview

**Company Name:** Ridecell  
**Founded:** 2011  
**Headquarters:** San Francisco, California  
**Global Presence:** Offices in Madrid, Paris, Berlin, and Pune, India  
**Team Size:** Approximately 211 employees  
**Categories:** SaaS, IoT, B2B, Enterprise, AI  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W12  

**Mission:** Ridecell aims to revolutionize fleet management with its Fleet Transformation Cloud. The goal is clear: automate processes to maximize fleet usage and efficiency.

---

### What Does Ridecell Do?

Ridecell is a pioneer in the digital transformation of fleet businesses, offering solutions that modernize operations by automating workflows and harnessing data insights. It focuses on the integration of various technologies—like telematics, cameras, and Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems (ADAS)—to foster efficiencies across leasing, rental, government, and commercial fleets.

Ridecell's technology is already powering some of the most successful fleet operations in Europe and North America. Notably, clients include:

- **Penske**: The largest truck fleet in America with 400,000 trucks.
- **Major Mobility Fleets** for brands like **Toyota**, **Ford**, **Daimler**, and **BMW**.
- **BNP Paribas, Arval**: Over 1.5 million vehicles, making it Europe's second-largest fleet provider.
- Significant government fleets, including those of **San Francisco** and **New York City**.

### Key Features

1. **Data-Driven Intelligence:** The Ridecell platform integrates multiple technologies to enhance operational intelligence, making fleets more efficient and safer.
2. **Automation of Workflows:** By transforming manual processes into automated solutions, fleets gain unmatched efficiency and control.
3. **Ridecell 360:** This holistic solution optimizes the fleet lifecycle from order to delivery, supplier performance, defleet to remarketing, leveraging AI for smart decision-making.
4. **Real-Time Insights:** With real-time data flow, the platform identifies issues before they escalate, enabling proactive management.

### Strategic Impact

By aligning their services with the needs of leading fleet operators, Ridecell has positioned itself as the industry leader in automotive-grade mobility solutions. Their innovations not only lower operational costs but also improve user experiences across the entire fleet lifecycle.

### Conclusion

In a world where efficiency and data utilization are paramount, Ridecell is charting a unique path, leveraging AI and automation to redefine fleet management and mobility. With a focus on enhancing operations and ensuring scalability, it continues to attract major players and grow its market presence.

For more information, visit their [website](https://www.ridecell.com).
